mapper.select:
select ptl.component_id, ptl.table_id, ptl.state , ptl.comment, ptl.start_time, ptl.end_time, ptl.counts, ptl.dispatch_type, ptl.appId, from tb_pipeline_table_log ptl where ptl.del_flag = 1 and ptl.table_id=#{tableId} and ptl.table_type=#{tableType} and ptl.del_flag =1
AND ptl.dispatchType like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
OR ptl.comment like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
OR ptl.state like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
